text: The following is a list of chancellors of the University of Cambridge from c.1215 to the present day.Chancellors of the University of Cambridge. British History Online. Retrieved on 30 July 2012. Chancellors were elected annually until 1514, and thereafter were elected for life. {| class="wikitable" |- !width="15%"|Tenure !! Chancellor !! Oxford Dictionary of National Biography says: "Wetheringsett [Wethersett], Richard of [Richard of Leicester] (fl. c.1200–c.1230), churchman and theologian, ... is not to be confused with the later chancellor Richard Leicester, who served in 1349–50." |- | 1351 || Richard Harling || |- | 1352 || Anthony of Grantchester || |- | 1352-1359 || William Tynkell || |- | 1359-1360 || Thomas Sutton || |-
